When Nathanael came to Jesus, the Saviour exclaimed, \93Behold an Israelite indeed, in whom is no guile!\94 Nathanael said, \93Whence knowest thou me?\94 Jesus answered, \93When thou wast 
130
under the fig-tree, I saw thee.\94 [John 1:47, 48.] And Jesus will see us also in the secret places of prayer, if we seek him for light that we may know what is truth.
